author: BBC Sport
title: Borussia Dortmund to 'pull together' against Monaco after explosions damage bus
description: "Shocked" Borussia Dortmund players will "pull together" when they face Monaco, 24 hours after their team bus was damaged by explosions.

author: BBC Sport
title: Sportsday - football news and gossip
description: Champions League build-up as Leicester visit Atletico Madrid, updates after Dortmund v Monaco postponed, plus gossip and debate.

author: BBC Sport
title: Wladimir Klitschko: Anthony Joshua will be 'facing Mount Everest' for heavyweight title
description: Wladimir Klitschko warns Anthony Joshua that fighting him for the heavyweight title will be like "facing Mount Everest".

author: BBC Sport
title: Fed Cup: Great Britain name unchanged team
description: Great Britain name a Fed Cup team of Johanna Konta, Heather Watson, Laura Robson and Jocelyn Rae for their tie against Romania.

author: BBC Sport
title: Juventus 3-0 Barcelona
description: Paulo Dybala scores twice as Juventus take charge of their Champions League quarter-final tie with Barcelona.

author: BBC Sport
title: Atletico Madrid v Leicester: How do Foxes win Champions League quarter-final?
description: Driven by the pain of two final defeats, Atletico Madrid are fearsome Champions League opponents for Leicester, writes Andy West.

author: BBC Sport
title: MCC confirms sendings-off and other laws to come in on 1 October
description: The MCC confirms that a series of law changes - including the introduction of sendings-off - will come into effect on 1 October.

author: BBC Sport
title: Belgium women 5-0 Scotland women: Anna Signeul's side lose Euro 2017 warm-up
description: Scotland women fall to a 5-0 defeat by Belgium in a friendly international at the Stadion Den Dreef in Leuven.

author: BBC Sport
title: Borussia Dortmund show class on troubling night of Monaco Champions League tie
description: BBC Sport looks at how Borussia Dortmund and their fans earned respect throughout the football world on a disturbing evening for the club.

author: BBC News
title: Liverpool launches bid to host 2026 Commonwealth Games - BBC News
description: City wants to host the event either in 2026 or in 2022, following Durban's recent withdrawal.
